answers.answer: Great job on 6 days!! GOD BLESS YOU and your baby. I have no idea about w/d's and pregnancy didn't  have a problem then.. Maybe someone else here has experience with that.. I am so sorry for your pain.. Do you have any other  complications, blood pressure, diabetes? Please don't take anymore if not for your sake your baby's.. GOD Bless you!

You should really talk to your doctor about how badly you are feeling.  Make sure you are taking good prenatal vitamins.  Ask about drinking Ensure and Boost drinks to give you some energy.  It's really hard to go thru this and then to be pregnant on top of it.You did such a wonderful thing by getting clean and you deserve to feel better and enjoy the rest of your pregnancy.Please talk to your doctor.

Hi there, I felt the same way day 6 I'm only day 8 clean n feel really good.... I walked two blocks today and felt good about it..... I only started feeling better yesterday day 7..... As far as ur legs someone told me to soak in a hot bath I did that and it helped with the aches!! Congrats on day 6....... It'll start getting easier everyday!!

Thanks everyone! I got out and played with kids today. Felt good but wore me out. Hurt so bad by the time we were done! Hot baths are great but I can't sleep in the bath tub lol! The doctor dud give ne some muscle relaxers. Just taking it day by day. But already feel so much better and proud of me! Never want to be back there again!

question: Ok 6 days clean! Went to rehab two days of subs then doc put ne on phenabarbitol. Tapered me off of that, my muscles hurt! When will my legs stop aching???? I want to crawl up and do nothing! I have nO energy. When can I expect this to end! Advice anyone? I know to exercise but what else? Also can't take much in the way of meds since I am six months pregnant. Any advice would be appreciated.
title: When does this end
